attributes.action: abolish at least 50% of fuel taxes that are in place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we can get enough then hopefully the prime minister will abolish fuel taxes, or part of, therefore dramatically bringing the cost of fuel down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
